seo.title: Time Calculator | Add Subtract Time - Hours Minutes Seconds Calculator Online
seo.description: Free online time calculator to add or subtract time values. Calculate time differences, add time to dates, and solve complex time expressions with days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
seo.keywords: time calculator, add time, subtract time, time arithmetic, hours calculator, minutes calculator, time difference, date time calculator

header.title: Time Calculator
header.description: Perform time arithmetic operations including addition, subtraction, and complex expressions. Calculate time differences, add or subtract time from dates, and solve time-based problems.

calculator.title: Time Calculator
calculator.description: Choose from three calculation modes: basic time arithmetic, date/time calculations, or complex time expressions.

datetime.title: Add or Subtract Time from Date

expression.title: Time Calculator Expression
expression.help: Use d (days), h (hours), m (minutes), s (seconds). Example: 1d 2h 30m + 45m - 15s

howToUse.title: How to Use the Time Calculator

basicOperations.title: Basic Time Operations
items: Enter time values using days, hours, minutes, and seconds
Click Calculate to see the result
Results automatically handle overflow (e.g., 70 minutes becomes 1h 10m)

dateTimeOperations.title: Date & Time Calculations
items: Set a starting date and time
Enter the amount of time to add or subtract
Get the exact resulting date and time
Useful for scheduling and deadline calculations

expressionSyntax.title: Expression Syntax
expressionSyntax.description: Use mathematical expressions with time units for complex calculations:

precision.title: Calculation Precision
precision.description: Our time calculator handles precise arithmetic with automatic unit conversion. All calculations maintain accuracy down to the second level, with proper handling of time overflow and negative results.
